title: Rune pages missing from dropdown menu in new champ select
body:
I have 20 rune pages, but the dropdown only shows 9 on each scroll of the menu. The first page of the menu shows pages 1-9. One mousewheel down shows pages 12-20.

 I cannot select pages 10-11 at all. This is in legacy client in new champ select only. Works fine in old select like ARAM.

Not sure if this is a bug or user error, but I need help either way.

replies.body: It's an odd issue that a half of your rune pages aren't showing.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this further.  If possible, do a custom game and grab some screenshots to attach to the ticket for some context.  We'll reply back asap!

Only two rune pages out of twenty do not show up - slots 10 and 11. I'm not sure how to demonstrate with screen caps. Is the dropdown menu supposed to show 10 pages at a time? 

Or is there another way to scroll through them other than mousewheel? I tried highlighting a page and using up/down arrow keys, but that didn't work.
Nope, you're doing it just fine.  It's okay if you don't have any screenshots now, we'll do our best to help.  Make sure to send that ticket so we can investigate this with you!
